comments:
This is on an Eclipse 3.2M5 and WTP1.5M5

Here is how to recreate:

-I have a Simple Project (also saw the problem on a Java Project)
-Got to the project's Properties
-Click on "J2EE Module Dependencies"
-An Error dialog opens - Click OK to close
-Now if I try to Cancel out of the Properties Dialog, I keep getting an Error Dialog.

There is no way to close the Properties Dialog so the only solution is to Terminate the Eclipse process.

Here are the stack traces in the Error Log:
